data.name: WelcomeIntro
data.value: This wizard allows you to upgrade PerformancePoint Monitoring Server 2007 content to PerformancePoint Services.

data.name: WelcomeBeforeYouBegin
data.value: Before you begin:

data.name: WelcomeBeforeYouBeginItem1
data.value: The destination site must be using SharePoint Server 2010 display mode.

data.name: WelcomeWhatWillBeImported
data.value: What will be imported:

data.name: WelcomeWhatWillBeImportedItem1
data.value: Imported content, such as dashboards and scorecards, will be placed in a single list.

data.name: WelcomeWhatWillBeImportedItem2
data.value: Imported data sources will be placed in a single document library.

data.name: WelcomeWhatWillBeImportedItem3
data.value: Security will be copied, with some exceptions. Learn more in the administration guide.

data.name: WelcomeWhatWillBeImportedItem4
data.value: Redeploy dashboards to the desired location by using PerformancePoint Services.

data.name: WelcomeWhatWillBeImportedItem5
data.value: The following report types will not be imported, because they are not supported in PerformancePoint Services:

data.name: WelcomeWhatWillNotBeImportedItem1
data.value: Spreadsheet

data.name: WelcomeWhatWillNotBeImportedItem2
data.value: Trend Analysis Chart

data.name: WelcomeWhatWillNotBeImportedItem3
data.value: PivotTable

data.name: WelcomeWhatWillNotBeImportedItem4
data.value: PivotChart

data.name: Exception_Dashboard_MissingReportView
data.value: A report used by this dashboard no longer exists.

data.name: Exception_Dashboard_MissingScorecard
data.value: A scorecard used by this dashboard no longer exists.

data.name: Exception_Database_Invalid
data.value: The database "{0}" is not a PerformancePoint 2007 content database. Choose a different database.

data.name: Exception_Database_ListDatabases
data.value: You do not have permission to read the list of databases. Choose a different user name and password.

data.name: Exception_Database_ListDatabases_WindowsAuth
data.value: You do not have permission to read the list of databases. Choose a different user name and password.

data.name: Exception_Database_ListDatabases_SQLAuth
data.value: You do not have permission to read the list of databases. Choose a different user name and password.

data.name: Exception_Datasource_DuplicateCharacter
data.value: This item was renamed to {0} because data sources cannot contain two consecutive periods. ( .. )

data.name: Exception_Datasource_DuplicateName
data.value: This item was renamed to {0} because duplicate data source names are not supported in this version.

data.name: Exception_Datasource_InvalidCharacters
data.value: This item was renamed to {0} because data sources cannot contain the following characters: " ' # % & * : < > ? \ / {{ | }} ~
data.comment: Exception Message DataSource name error, replaced items contain the original datasource name and new name.

data.name: Exception_Dashboard_InvalidCharacters
data.value: This item was renamed to {0} because dashboards cannot contain the following characters: " ' # % & * : < > ? \ / {{ | }} ~
data.comment: Exception Message dashboard name error, replaced items contain the original datasource name and new name.

data.name: Exception_Datasource_InvalidEndCharacter
data.value: This item was renamed to {0} because data sources cannot start or end with a period. ( . )
data.comment: Exception Message DataSource name error, replaced items contain the original datasource name and new name.

data.name: Exception_DocumentLibrary_InvalidType
data.value: Choose a document library, not a list.

data.name: Exception_DocumentLibrary_Permissions
data.value: The {0} identity does not have permission to write to this document library. Choose a different document library or connect with a different identity.

data.name: Exception_Filter_MissingDatasource
data.value: The data source used by the {0} filter of this dashboard no longer exists.
data.comment: Exception Message DataSource name error, replaced items contain the original datasource name and new name.

data.name: Exception_Kpi_Actual_MissingDatasource
data.value: The data source used by the Actual metric of this KPI no longer exists.

data.name: Exception_Kpi_Actual_MissingIndicator
data.value: The indicator used by the Actual metric of this KPI no longer exists.

data.name: Exception_List_InvalidType
data.value: Choose a list, not a document library.

data.name: Exception_List_MissingDataSourceType
data.value: The document library does not support the PerformancePoint Data Source content type. Choose a different document library, or add the content type to it.

data.name: Exception_List_MissingContentTypes
data.value: The {0} list does not support all of the PerformancePoint content types. Choose a different list, or add the following content types to the list: {1}

data.name: Exception_List_Permissions
data.value: The {0} identity does not have permission to write to this list. Choose a different list or connect with a different identity.

data.name: Exception_ReportView_MissingDatasource
data.value: The data source used by this report no longer exists.

data.name: Exception_ReportView_PivotChart
data.value: PivotChart reports are no longer supported. Recreate the report using Excel Services.

data.name: Exception_ReportView_PivotTable
data.value: PivotTable reports are no longer supported. Recreate the report using Excel Services.

data.name: Exception_ReportView_TrendAnalysis
data.value: Trend analysis charts are no longer supported. Recreate the chart using an analytic chart or Excel Services.

data.name: Exception_Scorecard_MissingDatasource
data.value: A data source used by this scorecard no longer exists.

data.name: Exception_Scorecard_MissingKpi
data.value: A KPI used by this scorecard no longer exists.

data.name: Exception_SiteCollection_MissingFeature
data.value: The PerformancePoint feature is not enabled for the selected site collection. Enable the feature or choose a different site collection.

data.name: Exception_Site_MissingFeature
data.value: The PerformancePoint feature is not enabled for the selected site. Enable the feature or choose a different site.

data.name: Exception_Site_AccessDenied
data.value: You don't have access to the selected site.

data.name: Exception_SiteCollection_AccessDenied
data.value: You don't have access to the selected site collection.

data.name: Exception_Unknown
data.value: Unreadable content was found in this item.

data.name: UserCouldNotBeFound
data.value: The user {0}, who had the {1} permission, cannot be found. This user will not be given permission to the item.

data.name: Exception_WebApplication_MissingFeature
data.value: The PerformancePoint feature is not enabled for the web application in the selected site collection. Enable the feature or choose a different site collection.

data.name: Exception_Kpi_Target_MissingDatasource
data.value: Data source referenced by KPI no longer exists.

data.name: Exception_Kpi_Target_MissingIndicator
data.value: Indicator referenced by KPI metric no longer exists.

data.name: Exception_Name_TooLong_KPI
data.value: This item was renamed to {0} because a KPI name cannot be longer than {1} characters in this version.
data.comment: Exception Message Displays Original Name and New Name

data.name: Exception_Name_TooLong_Scorecard
data.value: This item was renamed to {0} because a scorecard name cannot be longer than {1} characters in this version.
data.comment: Exception Message Displays Original Name and New Name

data.name: Exception_Name_TooLong_ReportView
data.value: This item was renamed to {0} because a report view name cannot be longer than {1} characters in this version.
data.comment: Exception Message Displays Original Name and New Name

data.name: Exception_Name_TooLong_Indicator
data.value: This item was renamed to {0} because an indicator name cannot be longer than {1} characters in this version.
data.comment: Exception Message Displays Original Name and New Name

data.name: Exception_Name_TooLong_Datasource
data.value: This item was renamed to {0} because a data source name cannot be longer than {1} characters in this version.
data.comment: Exception Message Displays Original Name and New Name

data.name: Exception_Name_TooLong_Dashboard
data.value: This item was renamed to {0} because a dashboard name cannot be longer than {1} characters in this version.
data.comment: Exception Message Displays Original Name and New Name

data.name: Exception_Name_TooLong_Filter
data.value: This item was renamed to {0} because a filter name cannot be longer than {1} characters in this version.
data.comment: Exception Message Displays Original Name and New Name

data.name: Exception_FolderName_TooLong
data.value: {0} was renamed to {1} because the folder name exceeeded the maximum character limit.
data.comment: Exception Message Folder name error, replaced items contain the original folder name and new name.

data.name: Exception_ReportView_SDK
data.value: This custom item has been imported, and its content has not been changed. Additional work might be required for this item to be used in PerformancePoint Services.

data.name: Exception_ReportView_Spreadsheet
data.value: Spreadsheet reports are no longer supported. Recreate the report using Excel Services.

data.name: Exception_ReportView_Strategymap
data.value: Strategy Map reports must be opened in Dashboard Designer to complete the import process.

data.name: SelectSecurity_FormTitle
data.value: How was security configured on the original server?

data.name: SelectSecurity_PerUser1
data.value: Each user's own account is used to access all datasources.

data.name: SelectSecurity_PerUser2
data.value: In the web.config files, the Bpm.ServerConnectionPerUser property was set to True.

data.name: SelectSecurity_PerUser3
data.value: Note: to use this authentication method, a domain administrator must configure Kerberos Delegation between all instances of the PerformancePoint Service Application and the data source servers.

data.name: SelectSecurity_SharedIdentity
data.value: A single shared user account was used to access all data sources.

data.name: SelectSecurity_SharedUserName1
data.value: A single shared user account was used to access all data sources, and the "CustomData" connection string property was used to send the user name.

data.name: SelectSecurity_SharedUserName2
data.value: In the web.config files, the Bpm.UseASCustomData property was set to True.

data.name: Exception_Kpi_Actual_MissingDatasource1
data.value: The data source used by the Actual metric of this KPI no longer exists.

data.name: SelectSecurity_FormDescription1
data.value: For data sources to work correctly, the authentication method used on the original server must be copied to the data sources being imported.

data.name: SelectSecurity_FormDescription2
data.value: In PerformancePoint 2007, this was set in the web.config file, and applied to the entire server.

data.name: SelectSecurity_PerUserTitle
data.value: Per-user identity (requires Kerberos Delegation)

data.name: SelectSecurity_SharedTitle
data.value: Default authentication

data.name: SelectSecurity_SharedUserNameTitle
data.value: Default authentication with user name in connection string

data.value: Cannot use the selected site for import.
